metadata.name: Floating Breadcrumb with Theme Toggle
metadata.description: A floating breadcrumb navigation component with a theme toggle feature. The breadcrumb links are interactive, and the theme toggle allows switching between light and dark modes. The design includes smooth transitions, hover effects, and a pulse animation for separators.
